Package com.cytech.fenetres

Class PageConnexionAdministrateurController

java.lang.Object
com.cytech.fenetres.PageConnexionAdministrateurController
public class PageConnexionAdministrateurController extends Object
Controller for the administrator login page. Handles administrator authentication and navigation to the administrator interface.

    • verifierMotDePasseAdmin

      public boolean verifierMotDePasseAdmin(String identifiant, String motDePasse)
      Verifies the administrator's password against the database.
      Parameters:
      identifiant - The administrator's ID
      motDePasse - The administrator's password
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • ConnexionBoutonAdministrateur

      public void ConnexionBoutonAdministrateur(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the administrator login button click event. Verifies credentials and navigates to the administrator page if valid.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered this method

    • retourBoutonPageConnexionUtilisateur

      Handles the return button click event. Returns to the home page.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered this method
